Simulate marks

Source: R/sim_degree.R
sim_marks.Rd

Simulate marks

Usage

sim_marks(students, start_year)

Arguments

students

students object

start_year

year started degree

Value

mark object

Examples

sim_students(2) |> sim_marks(2000)
